name: Eye of Thundera
description:
The Eye of Thundera is the mystical gem embedded in the hilt of the Sword of Omens. It is the source of the ThunderCat's power, and is tied directly to their life-force. It is traditionally passed to the current standing Lord of the ThunderCats.

According to Tygra; it was believed that the Eye was only from myths and legends.

The Eye itself has projected itself into the world via the form of a black or red Big Cat to act against evil or restore the natural balance of New Thundera.
